description:
Thanks for your interest in this course.

Having your own online TV show is an innovative way to market your business.

If you have a product, service or if you're an author or coach, you can broadcast to your customers and prospects via your own online TV show.

It's easier than you think, the initial equipment investment is small, all you need is a willingness to learn and experiment with practice Google Hangouts

Throughout this course, I've referred to examples from my own Preloved Chica show to share what's worked for me.

The course is divided up into 3 sections

  • Before the show
  • During the show
  • After the show
On completion of this course, you'll have all the skills you need to broadcast your own online TV show.

I hope you'll join me today.
title: Create your own online TV Show with Hangouts
